statements: SELECT * FROM food_traceability_system;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM food_traceability_system;
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM food_traceability_system ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM food_traceability_system WHERE supplier_id = 12345;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM food_traceability_system WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM food_traceability_system ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM food_traceability_system WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM food_traceability_system WHERE production_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM food_traceability_system WHERE supplier_id = 2 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(product_id) AS total_products, MAX(production_date) AS latest_production_date FROM food_traceability_system;
SELECT * FROM Food_Products;
SELECT product_name, category FROM Food_Products WHERE category='Fruit';
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Food_Products ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Food_Products WHERE product_id=1;
SELECT product_name, action_type, action_date FROM Food_Products JOIN Traceability_Logs ON Food_Products.product_id = Traceability_Logs.product_id;
SELECT * FROM Food_Products WHERE category = 'Vegetables' ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM Food_Products WHERE product_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT DISTINCT category FROM Food_Products WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT product_name, category, production_date FROM Food_Products WHERE production_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT p.product_name, t.action_type, t.action_date FROM Food_Products p JOIN Traceability_Logs t ON p.product_id = t.product_id ORDER BY t.action_date DESC
SELECT * FROM traceability_system;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM traceability_system WHERE location='Warehouse';
SELECT product_name, supplier_name FROM traceability_system ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM traceability_inspections WHERE inspection_result='Passed';
SELECT inspection_date, inspector_name FROM traceability_inspections WHERE inspection_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM traceability_system WHERE supplier_name='Supplier X';
SELECT product_id, product_name, production_date FROM traceability_system ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM traceability_logs JOIN traceability_inspections ON traceability_logs.inspection_id = traceability_inspections.inspection_id WHERE inspection_result='Pass' AND log_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT location) AS unique_locations FROM traceability_system;
SELECT inspection_id, log_details FROM traceability_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT name, category FROM Products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY name;
SELECT id, name, supplier FROM Products WHERE supplier = 'ABC Suppliers' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT id, test_name, test_date FROM QualityTests ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT name, category, supplier FROM Products;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE location = 'USA';
SELECT id, test_name, test_result FROM QualityTests WHERE test_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT p.name AS product_name, t.test_name, t.test_result FROM Products p INNER JOIN QualityTests t ON p.id = t.product_id;
SELECT tl.event_type, tl.details, p.name AS product_name FROM TraceabilityLogs tl LEFT JOIN Products p ON tl.product_id = p.id WHERE tl.event_date <= NOW();
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT product_name, production_date FROM Product ORDER BY production_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, production_date, expiration_date FROM Product WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT warehouse_location, capacity FROM Warehouse ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Product;
SELECT producer_name, location FROM Producer ORDER BY producer_name ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person FROM Supplier WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, production_date, expiration_date FROM Product WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT sale_id, product_id, quantity, total_price FROM Sales WHERE total_price > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
